about.author: Timo Homburg
about.comment: Akkadian Unicode Dictionary. This dictionary contains among others Akkadian noun base forms of words and shall be a basis for Natural Language Processing on the Akkadian language. The dictionary also features common Sumerograms which can be found in Akkadian.
